items: Projects are never complete, only abandoned.
Design is manipulative. Manipulation has a morality scale.
Understanding cognitive bias does not make you immune to it.
The universe is infinite. Human knowledge is not.
Rules are imaginary, consequences are not.
Emotion is the sum of environmental influence.
Personality is the sum of relationships. Relationships are the result of systems. Systems are the result of power struggle.
Derived categorizations are tools of oppression.
Socialism promotes pro-social behavior. Capitalism promotes anti-social behavior.
